ValidationRule.description: B13 - if Binder Cover Option value = Logo, then the Logo for the Binder Field must NOT be Null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Art__c, 'Logo')), (ISPICKVAL(Logo_for_the_Binder__c, '')), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a Logo for the Binder value when selecting the Binder Cover Option value of 'Logo'.
